content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: lime_banner
inventory=[{"type": "respawn_anchor", "quantity": 64, "index": 10}, {"type": "acacia_fence", "quantity": 30, "index": 13}, {"type": "tall_grass", "quantity": 26, "index": 14}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 15}, {"type": "magma_cube_spawn_egg", "quantity": 61, "index": 18}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 32, "index": 19}, {"type": "phantom_spawn_egg", "quantity": 4, "index": 23}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "warped_slab", "quantity": 50, "index": 27}, {"type": "sea_pickle", "quantity": 6, "index": 31}, {"type": "brain_coral_fan", "quantity": 17, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft a lime_banner, I need to craft 8 lime_wool, which require lime_dye. I have sea_pickle in my inventory, so I will smelt it to obtain lime_dye.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 31 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: lime_banner
inventory=[{"type": "respawn_anchor", "quantity": 64, "index": 10}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "acacia_fence", "quantity": 30, "index": 13}, {"type": "tall_grass", "quantity": 26, "index": 14}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 15}, {"type": "magma_cube_spawn_egg", "quantity": 61, "index": 18}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 32, "index": 19}, {"type": "phantom_spawn_egg", "quantity": 4, "index": 23}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "warped_slab", "quantity": 50, "index": 27}, {"type": "sea_pickle", "quantity": 5, "index": 31}, {"type": "brain_coral_fan", "quantity": 17, "index": 43}]
thought: Now I need to craft the lime_wool. I will start by moving the lime_dye from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
